name: Cure or waiver of defects Temporary Assignment of Retired Circuit Judges
text:
Cure or waiver of defects.  (a)  The circuit court of a circuit in which is commenced a civil case laying venue in the wrong circuit shall transfer the case, upon or without terms and conditions as the court deems proper, to any circuit in which it could have been brought, or if it is in the interest of justice dismiss the case.
	(b)  Nothing in sections 603-36 to 603-37.5 shall impair the jurisdiction of a circuit court of any matter involving a party who does not interpose timely and sufficient objection to the venue. [L 1972, c 88, §3(q)]
